experience_details:
1) Expedien eSolutions Pvt Ltd — Consultant (Apr 2023 – Present)
   - Defined business architecture; translated requirements into system functionalities; led UAT and MIS reporting; coordinated with stakeholders.

2) Quality Council of India — Analyst (Jan 2023 – Apr 2023)
   - Built periodic MIS reports and dashboards; automated Power BI refresh; supported interim reporting for Ministry of Railways.

3) Quality Council of India — Coordinator (Jan 2022 – Dec 2022)
   - Handled invoicing for 250+ coal sector clients; drafted BRDs; generated insights via Power BI and Excel dashboards.

4) Quality Council of India — Management Trainee (Jan 2021 – Dec 2021)
   - Coordinated 600 assessors across 200+ projects pan-India; led analytics for 4321 Urban Local Bodies on sanitation; ensured 100% data accuracy using pivot-based analytics.
